science.title: SCIENCE exposé
science.desc: A first-in-the-world PITERA™ discovery from SK-II's 24/7 Skin Fluctuation Study.

part1.title:
24/7 skin
fluctuation
study
part1.desc:
This face is inspired by SK-II's first-in-the-world
PITERA™ discovery in its latest study. It focuses
on understanding the daily skin condition of
young women and the changes they experience
every day, throughout the day.

part2.title:
SKIN CAN LOOK UP
TO 10 YEARS OLDER
IN A DAY
part2.desc:
SK-II's latest breakthrough 24/7 Skin Fluctuation
Study uncovers how women’s skin condition
fluctuates greatly within a day, even looking
up to almost 10 years older, due to
daily environmental stressors.

02.title: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF HER SKIN
02.desc:
She experiences changes across multiple
aspects of skin including pores, texture, dullness,
andredness on a daily basis.

03.desc: Move the slider from 7AM to 11PM to see her skin fluctuations.

04.desc:
If unresolved, the accumulation of these daily
fluctuating skin concerns can accelerate chronic
and visible signs of early skin aging in the
long run.

05.title: THE POWER OF
05.desc:
PITERA™ is the essential skincare ingredient
proven to stabilize her daily skin fluctuations and
transform her skin to Crystal Clear Skin.

06.desc:
Move the slider to see her skin
fluctuations stabilize.

07.title: DAY 1
07.desc: With PITERA™, her chaotic daily skin fluctuations begin to stabilize in just one day.

09.title: DAY 7
09.desc: In just one week, her skin remains consistent from morning to night and throughout the day, her skin's worsening points are minimized with PITERA™.

11.desc1:
In one bottle of use<sup>*</sup>, her daily skin condition is
stable and transformed to Crystal Clear Skin.

12.title: SKIN WELCOMES
12.desc: PITERA™ has a unique composition that resembles skin’s Natural Moisturizing Factors.

13.title: ONE AND ONLY PITERA™
13.desc1:
PITERA™ is absorbed quickly and deeply<sup>*</sup> into
skin to deliver all its goodness.<sup>**</sup>

14.title: CRYSTAL CLEAR SKIN
14.desc1:
PITERA™ stabilizes and improves her skin
holistically, transforming it to Crystal Clear.<sup>*</sup>

01.name: PITERA™ ESSENCE
01.tagLine:
Our Iconic Essence with over
90% PITERA™ for Crystal Clear Skin
01.hook:
PITERA™: SK-II's exclusive and naturally derived ingredient
 crafted from a proprietary fermentation process of a unique
yeast strain. (SK-II's owned Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate -
skinconditioning agent)

02.title:
FIRST-IN-THE-WORLD PITERA™
DISCOVERY FROM SK-II 24/7 SKIN
FLUCTUATION STUDY
02.desc:
Skin conditions fluctuate greatly within
 the day, even looking up to 10 years
older due to multiple daily stressors

03.title: SKIN WELCOMES IN
03.name: PITERA™
03.desc:
PITERA™ resembles skin's Natural Moisturizing
 Factors. Skin recognizes and welcomes it, allowing it
to be asborbed quickly and deeply* into your skin
delivering all goodness**, transforming to Crystal
Clear Skin.

carousel1.text:
PITERA™ replenishes skin's Natural
 Moisturizing Factors and locks in moisture
within the skin. Dryness caused by external
factors can be reduced.

carousel2.text:
PITERA™ restores skin's moisture barrier,
 keeping skin supple and soft. It minimizes
fine lines caused by dryness and leads to
skin firmness
carousel2.altText:
PITERA™ inhibits pre-aging and restores
skin's moisture barrier, keeping skin supple
and soft. It minimizes fine lines caused by
dryness and leads to skin firmness.

carousel3.text:
PITERA™ strengthens the skin barrier and
protects skin from environmental stressors.
carousel3.altText:
PITERA™ strengthens the skin barrier and
protects skin from environmental stressors.
It repairs and prevents skin damage caused
by intrinsic and extrinsic stressors and
anti-oxidation.

01.name: SKINPOWER CREAM
01.tagLine:
SK-II's best-selling cream targeting
early aging signs.

02.title:
DISCOVERY BASED ON
OVER 40 YEARS OF
SKIN AGING RESEARCH
02.01:
1. Asian skin’s elasticity declines faster at
younger ages.
02.02:
2. Loss of firmness is the first trigger of multiple
early-aging signs.
02.03:
3. Firmness doesn’t just refer to lifted skin –true
firmness can only be achieved when holistically
addressed.

01.title: INGREDIENT HIGHLIGHTS
01.name:
PITERA™ X
MULTI-FIRM
TECHNOLOGY
01.desc:
SK-II’s one and only PITERA™ combines with cutting-
edge Multi-Firm Technology to fight the early
signs of aging.

02.title: POWERED BY
02.name: PITERA™
02.desc:
PITERA™ strengthens skin’s fundamentals for multi-
firming. Skin recognizes and welcomes PITERA™,
 allowing it to penetrate deeply to replenish inner
hydration, tighten skin structure, and strengthen
skin’s barrier.
02.finePrint:
PITERA™: SK-II's exclusive and naturally derived ingredient
 crafted from a proprietary fermentation process of a unique
yeast strain. (SK-II's owned Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate -
skin conditioning agent)

03.title: ENHANCED WITH
03.name:
MULTI-FIRM
TECHNOLOGY
03.desc:
Featuring the science of cell regeneration and
collagen production promotion across skin’s layers.
This improves skin density and volume through
hydration.

carousel2.text:
SKINPOWER replenishes inner hydration
and tightens skin structure, protecting skin
against skin sagging and dropping.

carousel3.text:
SKINPOWER protects skin against redness,
roughness and flakiness.

01.name:
GENOPTICS
AURA ESSENCE
01.hook:
*In terms of value and volume sales in the relevant market
as of October 2021.

02.title:
DISCOVERY BASED ON
25 YEARS OF RESERACH
02.desc:
Dullness is not just caused by melanin or
pigmentation. It’s caused by multiple
“anti-aura” parameters both visible on
the skin surface and invisible within* that
come out as skin clouds.

01.title: INGREDIENT HIGHLIGHTS
01.name:
PITERA™ X
GENOPTICS AURA
COCKTAIL
01.desc:
SK-II’s one and only PITERA™ and the most advanced
GenOptics Aura Technology help reduce “anti-aura”
parameters and skin clouds to visibly brighten up skin
tone from within.

02.title: POWERED BY
02.name: PITERA™
02.desc:
PITERA™ provides the fundamentals for Aura skin.
Skin recognizes and welcomes PITERA™, allowing it to
penetrate deeply and work on all skin clouds,
transforming skin to Crystal Clear.
02.finePrint:
PITERA™: SK-II's exclusive and naturally derived ingredient
 crafted from a proprietary fermentation process of a unique
yeast strain. (SK-II's owned Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate -
skin conditioning agent)

03.title: ENHANCED WITH
03.name:
GENOPTICS AURA
COCKTAIL
03.desc:
SK-II’s most advanced brightening cocktail with De-Melano
P3C® targets anti-aura parameters and
reduces the appearance of dullness and
dark spots.

04.title:
SWITCH ON YOUR
BRIGHT AND
RADIANT AURA

carousel1.text:
Acts across skin layers*
to clear anti-aura parameters that cause
skin to appear dull and uneven.

carousel2.text:
Skin clouds and spots caused by melanin
and inflammation block skin’s inner aura
from shining through.

carousel3.text:
Visibly brightens up skin tone from within by
reducing anti-aura skin clouds and spots.

 to share with your audience

0.title:
FLY THROUGH
THE EXPERIENCE
0.subtitle:
Download a virtual flythrough of 
the first-ever World PITERA™ Day.

1.title:
A DAY
IN THE LIFE
OF HER SKIN
1.subtitle:
Understand her skin's daily
fluctuations and the power
 of PITERA™

2.title:
PITERA™
MILESTONES
2.subtitle:
Uncover the breakthrough discoveries
behind the science of PITERA™.

3.title:
PITERA™
ESSENCE
3.subtitle:
Transform skin to Crystal Clear with
SK-II's iconic essence.*

0.title:
WORLD'S FIRST SK-II
PITERA™ ESSENCE
0.subtitle: Nicknamed “Miracle Water”, PITERA™ Essence contains over 90% PITERA™ to transformskin to Crystal Clear.*

1.title:
SK-II LAUNCHES
FACIAL TREATMENT MASKS
1.subtitle: SK-II disrupts the skincare industry with one of the world’s first commercially available facial sheet masks.

2.title:
SK-II BECOMES AN EXPERT
IN ANTI- AGING
2.subtitle: SK-II sets its way to become an expert in anti-aging and early-aging care by launching SK-II Signs Treatment.

3.title:
SK-II LAUNCHES DROPPER
BRIGHTENING ESSENCE
3.subtitle: SK-II creates the world’s first dropper brightening essence powered by PITERA™ to help reduce the appearance of uneven skin tone.

4.title:
SK-II
 INTRODUCES LXP
4.subtitle: SK-II’s most luxurious range with highly concentrated PITERA™ to date.

5.title:
SK-II LAUNCHES
 STEMPOWER CREAM
5.subtitle: Breakthrough stem cell research led SK-II to discover that PITERA™ targets the source of early-aging. Stempower Cream helps restore radical firmness in skin.

6.title:
SK-II IS THE PIONEER
 OF AURA SKIN
6.subtitle: SK-II disrupts Skin Brightening category by creating ‘Aura Skin’ with the launch of Genoptics Aura Essence powered by PITERA™, known as Little Light Bulb.

7.title:
SK-II DEBUTS SKINPOWER
FOR EARLY-AGING CARE
7.subtitle: SK-II creates a new milestone in early-aging care by tackling multi-firmness with the launch of the SKINPOWER series powered by PITERA™.

0.title:
SCIENTISTS
DISCOVER PITERA™
0.subtitle:
While on a fervent quest to uncover a
revolutionary skincare ingredient that
would make beautiful skin a reality,
a group of scientists discovered the
iconic PITERA™.

1.title: SK-II AKITA STUDY PHASE 1
1.subtitle:
For over 10 years, SK-II scientists analyzed
the skin phenotype of 108 women aged
between 16-74 in Akita, Japan. They tracked
skin’s bio-physics in response to natural aging
patterns, gaining unique skin knowledge and
building SK-II’s pioneering skin age data bank
for continuous research purposes.

2.title:
PITERA™ FOUND TO
SUPPRESS NITRIC OXIDE
2.subtitle:
PITERA™ is found to suppress Nitric Oxide
leading to anti-oxidation for Crystal Clear Skin.

3.title:
PITERA™ FOUND TO ENHANCE 
SKIN RESILIENCE
3.subtitle:
PITERA™ was found to strengthen skin cell
renewal cycle for more resilient skin. Research
also showed that PITERA™ increases the
production of natural Hyaluronic Acid in skin.

4.title:
PITERA™ FOUND TO
IMPROVE HYDRATION
4.subtitle:
PITERA™ is found to enhance the enzyme
to produce skin’s Natural Moisturizing
Factors, allowing inner-hydration to lock
moisture from within.
4.title2:
PITERA™ DISCOVERED TO 
SUPPRESS MELANIN DARKENING
4.subtitle2:
Further research shows PITERA™
suppresses melanin darkening that leads
to long-lasting pigmentation.

5.title: SK-II AKITA STUDY PHASE 2
5.subtitle:
In the second phase of the study, the same 108
women used a SK-II PITERA™ regimen for one
year. After using SK-II with PITERA™, women saw
significant skin improvements on all dimensions -
texture, radiance, firmness, spot control and
wrinkle resillience - by up to 90%.

6.title:
PITERA™ SHOWN TO
INCREASE SKIN’s
RESISTANCE TO UV DAMAGE
6.subtitle:
PITERA™ suppresses inflammation and increases
resistance against UV damage to protect and
transform skin to Crystal Clear*.

7.title: SKIN DESTINY STUDY
7.subtitle:
In an unprecedented study, SK-II compared the
skin of 141 long-term PITERA™ Essence users – with
 an average of 13 years of use – with the skin of 137
non-PITERA™ users of a similar age. Results
showed that long-term users had an average skin
age 13.2 years younger than their real age.
7.subtitle2:
of long-term
SK-II users had better
skin compared to
non-users of the
same age group.

8.title:
PITERA™ FOUND TO
PROTECT SKIN CELLS
8.subtitle:
PITERA™ protects skin cells from
senescence by autophagy mechanisms.

9.title:
PITERA™
PRODUCT
INNOVATIONS
9.subtitle:
Trace SK-II’s monumental product
launches since the first-ever bottle
of PITERA™ Essence.

Immerse in the miraculous world of PITERA™ 
 in this experience dedicated to the iconic 
 ingredient at the heart of SK-II.
